examples.text: I don't know the answer to that
I want to go to London
Go to the door and listen
Get a look at the city
see if there is anything useful around
put the coin in my pocket
put the key in the door
put the paper in the box
use the key in the door
close your eyes and go to sleep
use the key in the door
I can't wait to see London
where can I find the door

values: What would you like to call me?

text: On the other side of the door you find a dark tunnel. The tunnel is made of old stone. You see a bright light towards the end of the tunnel.

values.text: Oh wow! Three questions already? Good job! You can now cross the bridge.
Maybe the game will help you get your mind off things.
You have to answer 3 questions to get on to the bridge to be able to get to the London Eye.
Here's a hint it'll say the exact same thing you just said

output.text: Sorry I don't understand

text: You can see Waterloo Bridge in front of you, there's a man standing blocking the bridge, He seems to want to talk to you.

output.text: The key is an old metal key.  It's most likely use is for unlocking doors.
You look through the key hole.  It's hard to see anything but it looks like there is light.

values.text: What is 1 + 1?
Incorrect
I don't understand. Do you want to go straight or turn right?
You keep walking. You see Big Ben on your right and Westminister Abbey on the right. You're in awe with the architecture. As you continue straight you get to Buckingham Palace.
Hi I'm $companionName! How are you feeling today?

output.text: You walk back to the room but there is nothing there but the creeky door and the stone floor
The tunnel doesn't have any turnings. You can only go straight.

text: You continue through the tunnel and see the light getting closer. You can smell the water from the river Thames so you know you're getting close to people.
You reach the end of the tunnel and feel a refreshing gush of air hit your face. There's a sign on your left pointing towards Waterloo Bridge. You follow it.
As you approach the bridge you see an old man standing near you.
He looks at you and says "Stop! Are you sure you want to go this way? "

output.text: You put your ear to door to see if you can hear anything. There's some sirens in the distance and the sound of water dripping from a pipe.
There isn't much around you. You can still hear the sound of the dripping water from a pipe that must have burst in the tunnel. You see a bright light towards the end of the tunnel.
Are you smelling something?
Sorry I don't understand
You go back down the tunnel to the room.
You cannot go that way
The man seems to be blocking the bridge you can either talk to him or go back to the room.
Sorry you can't get through the door. It's locked and you don't have a key.
There is a rusty key lying on the floor next to you.
The key is lying on the cobble stone floor near your feet.

values.text: Hello $name. What would you like to name your companion?
I’m sorry to hear that. Would you like to tell me more?

output.text: Sorry I don't understand
There is nothing to pick up
What can’t talk but will reply when spoken to?

text: Now time for the next one. What is full of holes but still holds water?

output.text: Incorrect
You can't go back.
That didn't work. The door can't be broken
It's a wooden door, it seems very strong. There The door is made of wood and looks strong.  There is a key hole but you don't have a key.

values.text: Let's go see what we find!

Tick... Tock... Tick... Tock... It's Finally your turn! You get into the capsule ready to see what's around. As the capsule starts rising youy get to see the city coming up around you. Oh look! There's Big Ben on the right. Wow there's Buckingham Palace. The city truly amazes you. As you get higher the people on the street start looking like ants marching around. Sadly the ride comes to an end. But now you get to go explore the city. What do you want to do now?
Go on.
Here's a hint: You put dish soap on it when you are cleaning the dishes.

text: You go across the bridge. The man has closed off the bridge so you can't go back but you're finally free. Do you want to turn right and go towards the London Eye to get a real look at the city. Or do you want to continue straight and explore more of the city?

values.text: Oh no! That's not right! Try again

output.text: Where do you want to go?
You are free! You can go now
You were lying on a stone floor. That sounds painful! You see a key lying on the floor near you.
I don't think that's in the room.

values.text: Go on.
No problem! Let's go see what we can find.
No problem!

output.text: You can't open the door. It is locked

text: The key fit into the lock! You slowly unlock the door not knowing what you will find on the other side.

output.text: You are standing on a surface made of stone.
You've picked up the key

values.text: Hello! Welcome to Adventure World. What is your name?
You better get across fast! I hear the London Eye closes soon.
You walk towards the London Eye. You're lucky the line isn't too long so you only have to wait about 10 minutes.
You're good at this. Aren't you?

output.text: The door is locked
Where do you want to go?
You slowly open the door
You are looking up at the ceiling it appears to be made from stone but you're not sure.
You are looking at the door, it is right in front of you.

values.text: You have just crossed Waterlook Bridge, You can't go back. You can go right towards the London Eye or continue straight and explore more of the city.
You find a bench near by. You rest your legs for a bit. There's someone sitting next to you on the bench. Do you want to talk to them?
Great that was an easy one. Now it'll get a bit harder.

output.text: You go back in the room
What do you want to pick up?
You can't pick that up
Sorry I don't understand

text: Great the key worked! The door has unlocked

output.text: You look around. The room is empty. There's no furniture and nothing on the walls. There is a door in front of you. You look down and see a key lying next to your feet.
You are currently in adventure world. If you need help on a task simply ask for it. If you want to know what's around you say look around.

values.text: After resting for a while you're ready to start exploring the city again.

output.text: You woke up in a room in some part of London but you have no idea how you managed to get locked in the room.

text: You deserve a rest! You sleep for about an hour but the sound of sirens in the distance wakes you up.
You open your eyes hoping it was all a dream but you are still in the same room. Locked in.

output.text: You can't unlock the door as you don't have a key. I suggest you look around the room to see what you can find.

values.text: I’m sorry to hear that. Would you like to tell me more?
No problem!
Let's Play! Where would you like to go today? The available locations are London.
That's not an option.
Welcome to London! You've woken up in a strange room and you don't know how you got there. You can see a door in front of you but its locked.
You can call me $companionName. How are you feeling today $name?
